author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA MOVING QUICKLY AWAY FROM BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME AN EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE LATER TODAY...
summary: ...MELISSA MOVING QUICKLY AWAY FROM BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME AN EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE LATER TODAY... As of 5:00 AM AST Fri Oct 31 the center of Melissa was located near 35.9, -64.0 with movement NE at 41 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
